text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS @realDonaldTrump To remove covid in plastic gloves. Gloves must have an outer cardboard or paper cover. So if they touch a surface with covid-19 they will only spread the covid for three hours and not throughout the day. reducing the spread by 30%.
